author: Simon Difford
description: Sherry is most prevalent on the palate, but all the other ingredients, including the lemon zest, also contribute to this subtle, balanced and altogether a most unusual cocktail.
name: Pablo Alvarez de Cañas Special
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Place lemon zest in shaker, add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
